item.title: Swiss tensions run high as clock ticks on U.S. tariff deadline
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump last week said he would impose 39% tariffs on Swiss goods starting later this week.

item.title: 'The revisions are hard evidence': White House struggles to justify firing of BLS chief over weak jobs numbers
item.description: The firing drew backlash from economists and others fearing that such a move will undermine trust in the key economic data in the future.

item.title: Trump and Carney to speak in the coming days, Canadian official says
item.description: Dominic LeBlanc, the federal cabinet minister in charge of U.S.-Canada trade, said that he believed a deal to bring down tariffs remained an option.

item.title: Senate confirms former Fox News host Pirro as top federal prosecutor for the nationâ€™s capital
item.description: The Senate has confirmed former Fox News host Jeanine Pirro as the top federal prosecutor for the nation's capital.

item.title: U.S. envoy tells Israeli hostage families he is working on plan to end Gaza War
